titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization of appropriations for the Keweenaw National Historical Park Advisory Commission.
A bill to increase the authorization of appropriations for the Keweenaw National Historical Park Advisory Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill increases the amount that may be appropriated for the Keweenaw National Historical Park Advisory Commission to carry out its duties with respect to Keweenaw National Historical Park in Michigan.
